## Iana.loadLanguageRegistriesFromZipBuffer() function

Loads language registries from a ZIP buffer containing the registry JSON files (web-compatible).

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function loadLanguageRegistriesFromZipBuffer(zipBuffer: ArrayBuffer | Uint8Array, subtagsPath?: string, extensionsPath?: string): Result<LanguageRegistries>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

zipBuffer


</td><td>

ArrayBuffer \| Uint8Array


</td><td>

ArrayBuffer or Uint8Array containing the ZIP file data.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

subtagsPath


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Path to the language-subtags.json file within the ZIP (default: 'language-subtags.json').


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

extensionsPath


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Path to the language-tag-extensions.json file within the ZIP (default: 'language-tag-extensions.json').


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Result&lt;[LanguageRegistries](./ts-bcp47.iana.languageregistries.md)<!-- -->&gt;

A Result containing the loaded LanguageRegistries or an error.
